Question: Variowell Development GmbH CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Variowell Development GmbH

Product: Pepaminto Mattress Topper

- Integrates thin warming-strips and naturally cooling bands of graphite to adjust heat dissipation
- Utilizes the capabilities of the Apple Watch to adapt to the user's thermal reception
- Automatically detects when a person is sleeping and adjusts temperature based on heart rate and body zones
- Measures sleeping-room air quality and informs the user of any unusual value changes
- Winner of the CES® 2023 Innovation Award in the category digital health
- Presented at CES® in Las Vegas, USA, and to be introduced in the UK and Switzerland

For more information, visit www.pepaminto.com
